Package vlille.state

Class VehicleState

java.lang.Object
vlille.state.VehicleState
Direct Known Subclasses:
Available, OutOfService, Rented, Stolen
public abstract class VehicleState extends Object
VehicleState is the abstract class for the state of a vehicle
